name: grow-template
description: Grow Template - Using Gulp, Pug && Sass.

scripts.copy: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:pug && npm run build:css && npm run build:wp
scripts.develop: npm run develop:css & npm run develop:webpack & npm run develop:pug & npm run server
scripts.build:css: node-sass --include-path scss app/assets/scss/style.scss dist/assets/css/style.css --output-style compressed --importer node_modules/node-sass-import --source-map dist/assets/css/
scripts.develop:css: node-sass --include-path scss app/assets/scss/style.scss dist/assets/css/style.css --output-style extended --importer node_modules/node-sass-import --source-map dist/assets/css/ -w

author: GrowGroup
